thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 16 of 539
thread.title: Grace

author: Grace
title: Grace
text: I just received my dress from prom girl.com and it fits like a dream!! The promgirl team was very helpful and responded quickly to any questions I had.. The dress is beautiful and it was under 100 dollars. HOWEVER you have to measure yourself .. I cannot stress that enough.. If you follow their sizing chart your dress will fit .. But i had a friend that just ordered what she thought would fit and it was way to small.. Measure measure measure!!
